thread.title: Become a Nutrition Specialist

author: admin
title: Become a Nutrition Specialist
text:
Can’t attend any of these dates? Click here for more options! 
Why Become Certified Through AASDN 
The AASDN Nutrition Specialist Program sets itself apart from other nutrition certification programs because: It is the only nutrition certification program that includes all materials utilized by certified members, including “ready to implement” documents and scripted programs. It is the only nutrition certification program that includes unlimited sports dietitian support. It is the only nutrition certification program with a defined scope of practice providing safe and effective programs. It is a “turnkey” program that allows you to immediately incorporate nutrition services into your existing wellness program (legal documents, administrative documents, educational handouts, menu plans and more). It includes scripted programs including one-on-one program, group program, child and youth program, scripted grocery shopping tours and more. 
Self Study Options 
Can’t attend any of these dates? Click here for more options! About AASDN 
As a Non-profit Organization, AASDN Sets Itself Apart from Other Nutrition Organizations: AASDN programs are based on sound , scientific nutrition information. AASDN programs are created by licensed professionals aimed at allowing non-licensed professionals to safely and legally incorporate nutrition. AASDN programs adhere to state nutrition licensure laws. AASDN members receive unlimited dietitian support. AASDN members (for a small annual membership fee) have access to all the documents necessary to implement nutrition programs. For more details read our “ Frequently Asked Questions “. Learn More About Our Programs
